meanings.definition: To present or bring into a place or situation for the first time.
meanings.sent1: I will introduce my friend to my family at the party.
meanings.sent2: Can you introduce me to your favorite book?
meanings.sent3: The shy puppy decided to introduce itself to the other dogs in the park.
meanings.sent4: The new student's arrival introduced a wave of excitement to the classroom.
meanings.sent5: The magician used a grand gesture to introduce his final trick.

meanings.definition: To make someone known to someone else by name.
meanings.sent1: Please introduce yourself to the new teacher.
meanings.sent2: I will introduce you to my friend Sarah at the party.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to introduce itself by knocking over a vase.
meanings.sent4: The famous actor's name introduced a sense of awe in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The tour guide introduced each historical figure with enthusiasm.

meanings.definition: To bring a new product or service into a market.
meanings.sent1: The company plans to introduce a new smartphone next month.
meanings.sent2: They will introduce a line of organic snacks to the market.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to introduce a unique dessert that became a hit.
meanings.sent4: The fashion designer introduced a fresh collection that caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The tech company introduced a groundbreaking feature in their latest update.
